TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GeometryDrawing extends System.Windows.Media.Drawing

Docs.summary: Draws a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen%2A>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the GeometryDrawing class with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> to paint an object with a shape, with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to create clip art, or with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
## Freezable Features A GeometryDrawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance. For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: public GeometryDrawing (System.Windows.Media.Brush brush, System.Windows.Media.Pen pen, System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Media.Brush brush, class System.Windows.Media.Pen pen, class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry) cil managed

Docs.param: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing">.
The pen used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing">.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush"> used to fill the interior of the shape described by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>.
Docs.value: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing">. The default value is `null`.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing">, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was `true.`

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"> object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was `true`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
